sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'
import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'
import { Box, Flex, Heading, Image, Grid, Spinner, GridItem, Button } from '@chakra-ui/react'

import Alert from '../components/Alert'
import Rating from '../components/Rating'
import { fetchProduct } from '../features/products/productSlice'
import { Store } from '../store'

const Product = () => {
  const { id }: any = useParams()
  const dispatch = useDispatch()
  const { product, status, error } = useSelector((state: Store) => state.productReducer)

  useEffect(() => {
    dispatch(fetchProduct(id))
  }, [dispatch])

  if (error) {
    return <Alert />
  }

  return (
    product ?
      <Grid templateColumns='repeat(4, 1fr)' gap={10}>
        <GridItem colSpan={2}>
          <Image src={product.image} />
        </GridItem>
        <GridItem colSpan={1}>
          <Box width='300px'>
            <Heading size='lg'>{product.name}</Heading>
            <Flex mt={6} alignItems='center'>
              <Rating value={Math.ceil(product.rating)} />
              <Box fontWeight='semibold' ml={3}>{product.numReviews} reviews</Box>
            </Flex>
            <Box
              mt={6}
              fontSize='xl'
              fontWeight='bold'
            >
              ${product.price}
            </Box>
            <Box
              mt={6}
              fontSize='lg'
              fontWeight='semibold'
            >
              Description: {product.description}
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </GridItem>
        <GridItem colSpan={1}>
          <Box w='225px' borderWidth='1px' borderRadius='lg' fontSize='xl'>
            <Flex p={2} borderWidth='1px' justifyContent='space-between'>
              <Box>Price:</Box>
              <Box>${product.price}</Box>
            </Flex>
            <Flex mt={2} justifyContent='space-between'>
              <Box>Status:</Box>
              <Box>{product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}</Box>
            </Flex>
            <Button w='100%' mt={4}>Add to Cart</Button>
          </Box>
        </GridItem>
      </Grid>
    : <Spinner size='lg' />
  )
}

export default Product
